    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(Clock other)
        Description copied from interface: Clock
        Update the current clock with a new one, taking into account the values of the incoming clock. E.g. for vector clocks, c1 = [2 1 0], c2 = [1 2 0], the c1.update(c2) will lead to [2 2 0].
        Specified by:
        update in interface Clock

      • setClock

        public void setClock(Clock other)
        Description copied from interface: Clock
        Change the current clock with a new one, overwriting the old values.
        Specified by:
        setClock in interface Clock

      • tick

        public void tick(java.lang.Integer pid)
        Description copied from interface: Clock
        Tick a clock given the process id. For Lamport timestamps, since there is only one logical time, the method can be called with the "null" parameter. (e.g. clock.tick(null).
        Specified by:
        tick in interface Clock

      • happenedBefore

        public boolean happenedBefore(Clock other)
        Description copied from interface: Clock
        Check whether a clock has happened before another one.
        Specified by:
        happenedBefore in interface Clock
        Returns:
        True if a clock has happened before, false otherwise.
